There's really nothing to be said that hasn't already been said. CSGO is the best competitive FPS on the planet.

Have played this game for a couple of years on and off now, but recently it's been really hard to do much of anything in the game, if you aren't out of silver really fast, then you will never get out of silver hell. Everyone in the lower ranks are super toxic and there are so many hackers everywhere it's a pain to play the game. Revised after playing 10 more hours : Still sucks ass.
